prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Before the emergence of generative AI, Pavol created the first Czech virtual whiteboard, Collboard, and electronic textbooks, H-edu, used by tens of thousands of children.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Pavol, generative AI, Czech, virtual whiteboard, Collboard, electronic textbooks, H-edu, children
